name: df-sbg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(csg, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cminusg, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ -g =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0), s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶(s1[(+ ` s0)]((invg ` s0)` s2))))
comment: Define group subtraction (also called division for multiplicative groups). (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
